  • Contact
GET STARTED

6.7% PER MONTH

Auto-trading scalping robot

Next generation trading software for MT4 to help novice and experienced traders becoming consistent, profitable and confident.

Try for free!

As seen on

100% Auto pilot

This software is built to fully automate your trading including take profit and stop loss. 

Mechanical rules

Sophisticated mechanical trading rules that will execute trades 24/5.

Risk management

The robot uses preset stop losses and take profits and can be adjusted.

Pass any challenge

Scalprobot can be used to pass any prop firm challenge. 

Verified track records based on historic market data.

TRUSTED BY 4700+ TRADERS WORLDWIDE

100% auto pilot

Stop blowing up your account and achieve financial freedom without spending hours in front of your screen. Join our algorithmic trading community with thousands of traders using our trading bots and outperforming the markets consistently.

Trade 24/5

Never miss a trade anymore.

Multiple pairs

Trade multiple pairs in your broker account

Expert trading plan

The robot trades according to a set of rules

100% Auto pilot

Don't spend even a minute. Plug and play!

  • Asset classes:
  • Currencies
  • Gold
  • Indices

See how the EA trades effortless in full auto pilot mode. Also during news events. Trade any pair the way you prefer, scalp mode or swing mode, single trade, grid trade,  anything is possible.  Set your profit goals and easily adjust settings and risk parameters. 

ALGORITHMIC TRADING IS THE INVESTMENT FUTURE

Built to outperform

The Scalprobot trading bot has outperformed most investment professionals, benchmark indices or crypto. Maximize your returns with this amazing trading software. 

"Manual trading is a losing game and the reason why 90% of retail traders fail. This is not a get rich scheme, but a professional trading approach to enter trades without emotions getting in the way. "
Scalprobot trading team

Test Scalprobot for free

Free 30 day trial

Open a demo account with a premium (agency model) broker suited for expert advisor trading. After your account is opened, we will send you the EA + set files. 

Open demo account

PLUG AND PLAY VIA cTRADER COPY

Why Scalprobot

Scalprobot is a proven strategy built to create an edge in trading which gives you an advantage. 

Win rate

Average win rate is 84%

Risk control

Built in risk management

All pairs

This trading robot trades all pairs, indices and gold

Profitability

Proven track record in live trading account

Buy your license

Purchase a life time license safe and secure and become a winner instantly.

*After your purchase is processed, we will send you the EA + set files (usually the same working day)

*We offer a one hour one on one coaching session, where we will explain exactly how and in which markets we use the robot.

+ bonus EA

€499 € 299
+vat in your country
  • Life time license Scalprobot
  • MT4 compatible
  • 60 minutes zoom webinar
  • Set files
  • Free updates
  • 24/7 support
  • Gridscalper EA license
Buy now!
Start your trial

Feel the excitement of artificial intelligent trading bots

About us

Our mission is to help traders across the world to be more consistent in trading and achieve their financial goals. We publish the best trading algorithms developed by professionals with oversight from those who have lived through these events on the worlds trading floors at the largest global investment banks.

Risk warning

Trading foreign exchange on margin carries a high level of risk, and may not be suitable for all investors. The high degree of leverage can work against you as well as for you. Before deciding to invest in foreign exchange you should carefully consider your investment objectives, level of experience, and risk appetite. The possibility exists that you could sustain a loss of some or all of your initial investment and therefore you should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose. You should be aware of all the risks associated with foreign exchange trading, and seek advice from an independent financial advisor if you have any doubts.

© 2024 Scalprobot™ All Rights Reserved.
